column1: Uchi////I've been to the original Uchi in Austin and loved it.  I'd have to say I love this one even more.  The food of course is an experience not just a meal.  If you're coming here expecting certain flavors you've had elsewhere
column2: you won't get that.  Be open to something different and unexpected
column3: and you'll love it from the first bite.  The service is impeccable here.  Every one of the staff helps to clear any finished plates quickly.
